thread.title: 16 Times Kelly Kapoor Was The Funniest Character On “The Office”
thread.title_full: 16 Times Kelly Kapoor Was The Funniest Character On “The Office”

author: Casey Rackham
title: 16 Times Kelly Kapoor Was The Funniest Character On “The Office”
text:
View this image ›
NBC ID: 10294783 2. When she knew what she was good at and shared it with the room. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10294766 3. When she gave Ryan what was coming to him. View this image ›
NBC Ryan: Do you have a question, Kelly?
Kelly: Yeah, I have a lot of questions. Number one: How dare you?
ID: 10294771 4. When she was realistic about her New Year’s resolution. View this image ›
NBC Kelly: My resolution was to get more attention.
ID: 10294779 5. When she was a straight-up liar. NBC
NBC
 ID: 10294814 6. And when she lied again. View this image ›
NBC Kelly: Ignore her, those glasses are so cool. You look like Lisa Loeb or Tina Fey or someone. You should definitely wear them all the time.
Pam: Huh. Maybe I will.
Kelly: Guess who just became the cutest girl in the office.
ID: 10294774 7. When she knew how to exaggerate her responsibilities. View this image ›
NBC Kelly: Well, I manage my department, and I’ve been doing that for several years now. And, god, I’ve learned a lot of life lessons along the way.
Jim: Your department’s just you, right?
Kelly: Yes, Jim, but I am not easy to manage.
ID: 10294769 8. When she figured out how to get what she wants. View this image ›
NBC Kelly: Basically nobody does anything for me anymore unless I threaten to kill myself.
ID: 10294768 9. When she did an A+ impression of Bridget Jones’s Diary . View this image ›
NBC ID: 10294778 10. When she couldn’t control her raw feelings for even a second. NBC
NBC
NBC
 Michael: Say hello to Danny.
Kelly: Fuck me.
ID: 10294790 11. When she was insulted anyone would ever think she has any weaknesses at all. View this image ›
NBC Gabe: What are your weaknesses?
Kelly: I don’t have any, asshole.
ID: 10294770 12. When she was happy for her ex. View this image ›
NBC Kelly: I cannot wait to visit Ryan in prison. I’m gonna wear my hottest track suit, get my hair done, and then be like, “Hi, Ryan.” Then all the other prisoners are gonna be like, “Damn, Ryan, you got a hot ex-girlfriend. Ooh, I would never have treated her so bad when I was outside of prison.”
ID: 10294776 13. When she was honestly 100% ice cold. NBC
NBC
 ID: 10294908 14. When she had a mini breakdown. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10294782 15. When she made Angela preemptively take aspirin. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10294765 16. And finally, when she branded herself before anyone else could. View this image ›
NBC Kelly: Who am I? I’m Kelly Kapoor. The Business Bitch.
ID: 10294777
